item.title: NumPy Library Intro
item.description: Intro to NumPy Python Library # Numpy official documentation: The fundamental package for scientific computing with Python. NumPy doesn’t depend on any other Python packages, however, it does depend on an accelerated linear algebra library - typically Intel MKL or OpenBLAS. Users don’t have to worry about installing those For the basics intro see: https://numpy.org/devdocs/user/quickstart.html Installation # Via conda or pip: pip install numpy Import # Customary way to import:
